version_description:
1. Added support for images with size < 142px (also fixed crash). Now you can scale image as small as 1px.
2. Added preview for comparing output and input images.
3. Optimized processing queue which saves 10% memory usage.
4. Japanese localiza

1. Added support for images with size < 142px (also fixed crash). Now you can scale image as small as 1px.
2. Added preview for comparing output and input images.
3. Optimized processing queue which saves 10% memory usage.
4. Japanese localiza

1. Fixed crash when saving image is finished after returning to main view.
2. Disable auto sleep while processing to prevent crash when device enters sleep mode.
3. Added warning when RAM is not enough in estimation.
4. Added confirmation on givi

1. Fixed crash when saving image is finished after returning to main view.
2. Disable auto sleep while processing to prevent crash when device enters sleep mode.
3. Added warning when RAM is not enough in estimation.
4. Added confirmation on givi

1. Added batch process mode.
2. Adjusted the main interface.
3. Added support for Slide Over on iPad.
4. Added crash report based on Google Firebase.
5. Accelerated processing on alpha channel when Metal is not available.
6. Fixed several b

1. Added batch process mode.
2. Adjusted the main interface.
3. Added support for Slide Over on iPad.
4. Added crash report based on Google Firebase.
5. Accelerated processing on alpha channel when Metal is not available.
6. Fixed several b

1. Fixed noise reducing when upscale to 4x in batch mode.
2. Modified order of images in image picker of batch mode to match with other modes.
3. Added battery protection mode to prevent issues with batteries.
4. Fixed several other issues.

1. Fixed noise reducing when upscale to 4x in batch mode.
2. Modified order of images in image picker of batch mode to match with other modes.
3. Added battery protection mode to prevent issues with batteries.
4. Fixed several other issues.

1. Workaround for not working properly on A12 chip (Run on CPU only).
2. Fixed several crashes.

1. Workaround for not working properly on A12 chip (Run on CPU only).
2. Fixed several crashes.

Fixed mail view not disappearing in feedback.
P.S. Please contact me if anyone at Google would like to write an internal reference letter for my HC review. Thanks ahead!

Fixed mail view not disappearing in feedback.
P.S. Please contact me if anyone at Google would like to write an internal reference letter for my HC review. Thanks ahead!
Disabled neural engine on A12 chip due to compatibility issue.
Disabled neural engine on A12 chip due to compatibility issue.

1. New backend based on pure MPSCNN which can reduce processing time up to 40%. It can also significantly reduce CPU utilization.
2. Option to change back to legacy Core ML backend in case of incompatibility.

1. New backend based on pure MPSCNN which can reduce processing time up to 40%. It can also significantly reduce CPU utilization.
2. Option to change back to legacy Core ML backend in case of incompatibility.
Fixed crash caused by incompatibility of MPSCNN on iOS 11.
Fixed crash caused by incompatibility of MPSCNN on iOS 11.

1. Fixed crash and hang after clicking interrupt button while running with MPSCNN backend.
2. Updated compiler to Swift 5.
3. Dropped support for iOS 11 since I don't have any device running iOS 11 for testing.

1. Fixed crash and hang after clicking interrupt button while running with MPSCNN backend.
2. Updated compiler to Swift 5.
3. Dropped support for iOS 11 since I don't have any device running iOS 11 for testing.

1. Support iOS 13 dark mode.
2. Support selecting images from file browser.
3. Support launching from share menu in other apps.
4. Discard system image picker because it doesn't provide full-sized image in some cases.
5. Combine single mode an

1. Support iOS 13 dark mode.
2. Support selecting images from file browser.
3. Support launching from share menu in other apps.
4. Discard system image picker because it doesn't provide full-sized image in some cases.
5. Combine single mode an

1. Added HEIF output format on supported devices.
2. Added alternative icon for the app (requested by too many people).
3. Fixed crash while producing large output images in MPSCNN backend.
4. Fixed several other bugs.

1. Added HEIF output format on supported devices.
2. Added alternative icon for the app (requested by too many people).
3. Fixed crash while producing large output images in MPSCNN backend.
4. Fixed several other bugs.

1. Show image details before and during processing.
2. Add white variation of the new icon. (Switch in preferences)
3. Improved performance when processing large images.
4. Preserve image scale and rotation info after processing (JPEG only).
5

1. Show image details before and during processing.
2. Add white variation of the new icon. (Switch in preferences)
3. Improved performance when processing large images.
4. Preserve image scale and rotation info after processing (JPEG only).

1. Added option to delete input images after saving.
2. Fixed incomplete output if input image has 64 bit color.
3. Fixed several minor issues.

1. Added option to delete input images after saving.
2. Fixed incomplete output if input image has 64 bit color.
3. Fixed several minor issues.

1. New in-app image picker (experimental).
2. Show output size while setting up parameters.
3. Other minor enhancements.

1. New in-app image picker (experimental).
2. Show output size while setting up parameters.
3. Other minor enhancements.

This will be the final version that supports iOS 12.
1. Switch to new image picker.
2. Fixed "out of memory" when process speed is too high.

This will be the final version that supports iOS 12.
1. Switch to new image picker.
2. Fixed "out of memory" when process speed is too high.

Experimentally added brand new UI featuring:
1. Full list of added images with adaptive layout.
2. Show details for both input and output images during and after processing.
3. Support for adding images from album, file, share menu, drop (iPad).<

Experimentally added brand new UI featuring:
1. Full list of added images with adaptive layout.
2. Show details for both input and output images during and after processing.
3. Support for adding images from album, file, share menu, drop (iPad).<

Bug fixes:
- Fixed random crash after adding images.
- Fixed crash when generating large images in Core ML.

1. Launch the new UI by default.
2. Changed default icon. You can still change back if you prefer the old one.
3. Fixed several minor issues.

1. Launch the new UI by default.
2. Changed default icon. You can still change back if you prefer the old one.
3. Fixed several minor issues.

1. Added CUnet model (requires an one-time purchase).
2. Fixed offset on output images.
3. Preserve the original file name at the beginning if the image is from file picker.

1. Added CUnet model (requires an one-time purchase).
2. Fixed offset on output images.
3. Preserve the original file name at the beginning if the image is from file picker.

The macOS version of this app "waifu magnifier" is now available in the Mac App Store.

1. Fixed images not showing on *** **(censored).
2. Changed noise level naming to avoid confusion.

The macOS version of this app "waifu magnifier" is now available in the Mac App Store.

1. Fixed images not showing on *** **(censored).
2. Changed noise level naming to avoid confusion.

1. You can now load and save images with 16-bit color (PNG only). Enable this feature in preferences page.
2. The old UI will be removed in a future version. If you are still using it, consider switching to the new one.

1. You can now load and save images with 16-bit color (PNG only). Enable this feature in preferences page.
2. The old UI will be removed in a future version. If you are still using it, consider switching to the new one.

If you have purchased additional models recently but not able to download, please try again. Thanks for your understanding!

Fixed black lines in output images on A8 GPU devices (iPad Air 2 and iPad Mini 4).
Fixed black lines in output images on A8 GPU devices (iPad Air 2 and iPad Mini 4).

Fixed config not effective after the engine selection prompt.

Recent updates:
1. Significantly improved speed and CPU consumption of Core ML backend (especially on devices with Neural Engine).
2. Added option to choose between ANE (Neural Eng

Fixed config not effective after the engine selection prompt.

Recent updates:
1. Significantly improved speed and CPU consumption of Core ML backend (especially on devices with Neural Engine).
2. Added option to choose between ANE (Neural Eng

Maybe fixed crash of sanity check at launch.

It was reported that Core ML causes blank output under some unknown circumstances. Now it will be automatically switched to MPSCNN if a sanity check for Core ML fails at launch.

Maybe fixed crash of sanity check at launch.

It was reported that Core ML causes blank output under some unknown circumstances. Now it will be automatically switched to MPSCNN if a sanity check for Core ML fails at launch.

1. File names will preserved for images imported by action extension from other apps.
2. Enable Core ML sanity check by default, making it available to wherever Firebase is not accessible.

1. File names will preserved for images imported by action extension from other apps.
2. Enable Core ML sanity check by default, making it available to wherever Firebase is not accessible.
Temporary workaround for crash on some pre-release iOS version.
Temporary workaround for crash on some pre-release iOS version.

This version contains a lot of changes in all backends. Please consider sending a feedback report if something is broken. Thanks!
1. Reduced up to 75% memory usage with Core ML.
2. Reduced up to 20% memory usage while scaling to 4x.
3. Support 16

This version contains a lot of changes in all backends. Please consider sending a feedback report if something is broken. Thanks!
1. Reduced up to 75% memory usage with Core ML.
2. Reduced up to 20% memory usage while scaling to 4x.
3. Support 16
Fixed desaturated color if Display P3 image is saved in HEIF.
Fixed desaturated color if Display P3 image is saved in HEIF.

Fixed 4x not working with CUnet when libpng is enabled.

Added an option to use libpng as PNG encoder. It has the following benefits:
1. Save up to 20% time while processing large images.
2. Save up to 80% memory usage. You can now process eve
